Docs.summary: Provides classes and interfaces that support queries that use Language-Integrated Query (LINQ).

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.Linq> namespace is in the System.Core assembly (in System.Core.dll).
The <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable> class contains [!INCLUDE[vbteclinq](~/includes/vbteclinq-md.md)] standard query operators that operate on objects that implement <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601>.
The <xref:System.Linq.Queryable> class contains [!INCLUDE[vbteclinq](~/includes/vbteclinq-md.md)] standard query operators that operate on objects that implement <xref:System.Linq.IQueryable%601>.
For more information, see [LINQ to SQL](/dotnet/framework/data/adonet/sql/linq/).
